description:
This episode of Meisaku is inspired by "The Cat That Lived A Million Times." Student Council President, Chienetsu Harusame, has abducted Meisaku`s classroom cat! However, it turns out that the cat, whose name is Roly Poly, is adored by the president... Chienetsu Harusame is voiced by Natsuki Hanae.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Cat That Got a Million Likes
